channel.title: Is it legal?
channel.description: Ok, i was at wal-mart and i was going to steal a couple games, but i realized that if i was caught i could get in a lot of trouble due to my current predicament. So i left them there, one is out of its case on a shelf, am i still ok since it never left the store or is that still illegal?

item.title: Is it legal?
item.dc:creator: @Itachi_Uchiha Itachi Uchiha
item.description:
@Itachi_Uchiha wrote:

[quote=“Hiaburi, post:1, topic:91754”]So i left them there, one is out of its case on a shelf, am i still ok since it never left the store or is that still illegal?[/quote]Thats like opening a candy bar, smelling it and putting it back. I wouldn’t want some random bastard smelling my candy bar…

Read full topic

item.title: Is it legal?
item.dc:creator: @Hiaburi Hiaburi
item.description:
@Hiaburi wrote:

ok… no its just that i wondered if it was legal becuase thats the first time i ever screwed up, and i did screw up because i freaked out last second because i realized that if i even sneez wrong right now i will go to juvy for a month, at least, so getting caught stealing 150$+, i figured would really get me in trouble

Read full topic

item.title: Is it legal?
item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

Mr.Chris lol… naw. Hiaburi seriously, the police can put you to jail for a day or something if you take the item with you and LEAVE the shop. I mean, if you look at something, hold it in your hands you’re gonna put into jail? I’lold. You need to be seriously retarded if you think that this is the worst thing you ever done in your life then, go to somewhere and do benji-jumping, it’s really fun. There is no need to change your personality or anything else on the internet or real life just to be cool. Be yourself.

EDIT: If you want something, get a job. Every year at school we need to get a job for two weeks and we need to earn 200€ in that time if we want to visit another country. If I can make 200€ in two weeks and I’m 14 then it can’t be hard for you to get a job. Pull your socks and get straightened.

Read full topic

your like, my idol.

Stop trying to act cool on the internet, it just doesn’t work.

not at all because it is u

vandalism?

item.title: Is it legal?
item.dc:creator: @Mr.Chris Mr.Chris
item.description:
@Mr.Chris wrote:

A theft from a store can only be called theft if you try to leave the store without paying for the game.

Read full topic

item.title: Is it legal?
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

Think about it, what crime have you commited? You took a game off the shelf, decided you didn’t want it and put it back.

Use some logic, I’ve never seen a crime “Putting game on wrong shelf” - i hear it carries a max. sentence of 3 years though.

Read full topic
